title: Unit 5: Growing Up - Comprehensive Test
description: Test de vocabulario y expresiones conversacionales sobre la infancia, educación y experiencias del pasado

questions.question: Which subject involves studying numbers and calculations?
When you want to correct something you said, you can say:
Physical education (P.E.) is a school subject about sports and exercise.
Traduce: 'Viví allí durante mucho tiempo.'
questions.answer: I lived there for a long time

questions.question: What does 'get into trouble' mean?
options: To do something wrong and face consequences
questions.answer: To do something wrong and face consequences

questions.question: Most _____ the students in my class were bilingual.
The year 2007 is pronounced 'two thousand and seven'.
Which expression shows you're interested in what someone is saying?
Traduce: 'Dejé la escuela hace tres años.'
questions.answer: I quit school three years ago

questions.question: What is the past form of 'are'?
Traduce: '¿Te llevabas bien con tus compañeros de clase?'
questions.answer: Did you get along with your classmates?
